00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A dose scoring ausgab object for beampp: Allows the user to score dose in
00031 #  specified CMs on a region-by-region and/or medium-by-medium basis. Volumes
00032 #  of all regions are assumed to be 1 cm^3 unless explicitly specified by the
00033 #  user.
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */

00038

00085 class BEAM_DOSE_SCORING_EXPORT BEAM_DoseScoring : public EGS_AusgabObject {
00086 
00087 public:
00088 
00089     BEAM_DoseScoring(const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f = 0);
00090 
00091     ~BEAM_DoseScoring();
00092 
00093     int processEvent(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) {
00094 
00095         int ir = app->top_p.ir, imed = ir>=0 ? app->getMedium(ir):-1;
00096         EGS_Float edep = app->getEdep();
00097 
00098         if (d_reg_index[ir]<0) {
00099             return 0;
00100         }
00101 
00102         /**** energy deposition in current region ***/
00103         if (iarg <= 4 && ir >= 0 && edep > 0 && dose) {
00104             dose->score(d_reg_index[ir], edep*app->top_p.wt);
00105         }
00106 
00107         /**** energy deposition in a medium ***/
00108         //put it here so it doesn't get scored if this is not a scoring region
00109         if (iarg <= 4 && imed >= 0 && edep > 0 && doseM) {
00110             doseM->score(imed+nmedia*d_reg_cm_ind[ir], edep*app->top_p.wt);
00111         }
00112         return 0;
00113     };
00114 
00115     bool needsCall(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) const {
00116         return true;
00117     };
00118 
00119     void setApplication(EGS_Application *App);
00120 
00121     void reportResults();
00122 
00123     void setCurrentCase(EGS_I64 ncase) {
00124         if (ncase != m_lastCase) {
00125             m_lastCase = ncase;
00126             if (dose) {
00127                 dose->setHistory(ncase);
00128             }
00129             if (doseM) {
00130                 doseM->setHistory(ncase);
00131             }
00132         }
00133     };
00134     int getDigits(int i) {
00135         int imax = 10;
00136         while (i>=imax) {
00137             imax*=10;
00138         }
00139         return (int)log10((float)imax);
00140     };
00141 
00142     void setVol(const vector<EGS_Float> volin) {
00143         vol_list=volin;
00144     };
00145     void setVol(const EGS_Float volin) {
00146         vol_list.push_back(volin);
00147     };
00148     void setDoseCMs(const vector <int> dcm) {
00149         d_cms=dcm;
00150     };
00151     void setMediumScoring(bool flag) {
00152         score_medium_dose=flag;
00153     };
00154     void setRegionScoring(bool flag) {
00155         score_region_dose=flag;
00156     };
00157 
00158     bool storeState(ostream &data) const;
00159     bool setState(istream &data);
00160     void resetCounter();
00161     bool addState(istream &data);
00162     int addTheStates(istream &data);
00163 
00164 protected:
00165     BEAMpp_Application *bapp;
00166     EGS_ScoringArray *dose;  
00167     EGS_ScoringArray *doseM;  
00168     vector <EGS_Float>  vol_list; // Input list of region volumes
00169     vector <int> d_cms;       // List of CMs for which dose is to be output
00170     vector <int> d_region;        // Input list of dose scoring regions  d_reg[i] = ir
00171     vector <int> d_reg_index;     // list index for dose scoring regions d_reg_index[ir]= 0..d_reg.size()-1
00172     vector <int> d_reg_cm_ind;    // dose CM index for each dose region.  Allows quick scoring of medium dose.
00173     vector < vector <int> > cm_med; // list of media present in CMs in which dose is scored
00174     vector <EGS_Float>  vol;      // geometrical region volumes
00175     int nreg,     // number of regions in the geometry
00176         nmedia;   // number of media in the input file
00177     int max_dreg, // maximum dose region number
00178         max_medl; // maximum medium name length
00179     EGS_I64    m_lastCase;   
00180     bool score_medium_dose,
00181          score_region_dose;
00182 };
